tickets.reason: Prerequisite per RFC-0020 ticket decomposition ordering

in_scope: Implement optional VDF profile referenced by EpochSealV1
Derive deterministic challenge from (cell_id, prior_epoch_root, quorum_anchor)
Validate forged/fast-forward/conflicting VDF proofs in adversarial tests

steps: Read the bound requirement(s) and this ticket scope; confirm no scope creep beyond out_of_scope list.

notes.security: Fail-closed, least privilege, and explicit authority proofs are mandatory.

notes.general: Keep scope atomic to this ticket, preserve explicit dependency ordering, and avoid introducing semantic drift from RFC-0020.
